channel.title: Sjoerd De Jong on Niiok's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Sjoerd De Jong on Niiok's Blog

item.title: Unreal Kickstart
item.description: About this kickstart Kickstart for giving Big picture perspective of UE4 Not a step-by-step walkthrough of how to use UE4 about what, why, terminology, logic, history plus advices and practises for beginners Composed with Philosophy and Intro Schematic Overview Advice Presenters Sjoerd De Jong Evangelism Lead Europe 20 Years experience with UE1-4 Anything content or Blueprint related except for Animation/Audio Mario Palmero 8 hours years experience with UE3/4 Programming, Tech Art and Animation Contents World Building Rendering Animation Engine Structure Programming Blueprint Character Material
